title: Playstation 5 event in 22 minutes (hardware + games)
description: Sony unveiled the new Playstation 5 and debuted a bunch of PS5 game trailers, including Resident Evil 8, Horizon Forbidden West, Gran Turismo 7, Spider-Man: Miles Morales, and more. We even got to see what the accessories look like. The next-generation PS5 will arrive later this year during the holidays.  Read more:   Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:   Chapters 0:00 Hardware Reveal 0:42 Features 1:11 Spider-Man: Miles Morales 1:41 Gran Turismo 7 1:59 Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart  2:50 Project Athia 3:33 Stray 4:30 Returnal 5:43 Sackboy A Big Adventure 6:50 Destruction AllStars 7:20 Kena: Bridge of Spirits 8:38 Goodbye Volcano High 9:09 Oddworld: Soulstorm 10:06 Ghostwire: Tokyo 11:04 Jett: The Far Shore 12:12 Godfall 12:46 Solar Ash 13:40 Hitman III 14:34 Astros Playroom 14:57 Little Devil Inside 15:40 NBA 2K21 16:06 Bugsnax 16:49 Demons Souls 17:35 Deathloop 18:36 Resident Evil Village 19:57 Pragmata 21:06 Horizon Forbidden West  Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:  More about our podcasts:   Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:
transcript: - Welcome to PlayStation 5. (calm electronic music) (compelling electronic music) (gentle chimes music) (glass shattering) (electricity buzzing) - [Narrator] Go be a hero, Miles. Feelin' just don't stop it now Trying hate on us Ain't worry 'bout a thing Since I'm strong enough (upbeat hip hop music) (upbeat electronic music) (car tires screeching) (engine revving) (engine revving) (whimsical strings music) - Whoa! (gasping) You all right back there? No way. - [Enemy Robot] I have it in my sight. - [Clank] They have found us Ratchet. (groaning) - [Ratchet] How do I steer this thing? - [Clank] Ask nicely. - [Ratchet] Slow down, please! It's not listening. (screaming) (grunting) Ratchet, we are too late. Ratchet? - Who? (dramatic orchestra music) (intense orchestral music) (growling) (intense violin music) (growling) (eerie chimes music) (beeping and mechanical clanking) (eerie electronic music) (mechanical clanking) (meowing) (intense orchestra music) - [Narrator] Over and over, I relive my first moments on this alien planet. The attack. My death. Trapped in this endless cycle. Even death is no escape. Each time I awake, this planet seems somehow different. As if changing. This world is becoming part of me. Infecting my mind. My memories. The longer I spend here. The more I can feel my sanity slip away. But I cannot lose hope. (eerie instrumental music) (gunshots rapidly firing) (upbeat drum music) (gentle pop music) (playful instrumental music) Anyone, anywhere Do you see my flare Anywhere, anyhow Anyone, anywhere Do you see my flare Anywhere, anyhow 'Cause I'm over and out (playful screaming) - [Narrator] Welcome to London! And our main event. Looking to settle some scores and crush anyone in his way, Ultimo Ricardo. Challenging him is Jai. We're rolling again No battle, no fight, no game Maps made to be broken Brakes to become retained, nah, nah No battle, no brakes, no fame Doctor, doctor, we're rolling again (gentle whistling music) (calming instrumental music) - [Narrator] I know your kind. You sense the power that flows though this land. Yet, you do not fully understand it. (bright instrumental music) Driven by the belief that you can help these troubled spirits. But you cannot hide your weakness from me. (eerie orchestra music) You have no power here, Kena. (intense instrumental music) (gentle whistling music) - You ever feel like you're just waiting for a sign? To do that thing you've always meant to do. Sometimes I feel like I'm just standing on the edge of doing great things but something's holding me back but if we've got nothing else to lose might as well jump. This is the end And when (eerie instrumental music) - [Narrator] You are no longer a slave, Abe. They believed, trusted, followed and it led them here. You may have escaped the murderous blades but the fate of your entire people is up to you. (mechanical and electronic blasting) (clock ticking) You must find your full voice. (intense rock music) - [Narrator] You see things others can't. Hear threats others don't. Fight, when others won't. It's up to you, to save Tokyo. (upbeat electronic music) (calming instrumental music) (upbeat hip hop music) Make way for the king Make way for the king Can't hold me down So gimmie the, gimmie the crown Make way for the We are not the same We are not the same Make way for the king (electronic glitching) (eerie chimes music) - You've arrived. Afraid? You should be. - [Narrator] It was always gonna end like this. All your hard work, all your sacrifice, only sped up the process. But now you find yourself alone. (intense electronic music) Only death awaits. (cheery squeaking) (upbeat pop music) (tense guitar music) (delicate violin music) (plucky string music) (somber violin music) (calming violin music) (plopping) (intense violin music) (roaring) (basketball dribbling) I ain't trying to break you down But for real I know Imma set 'em straight You better just run for your life (triumphant instrumental music) Run for your life - [Narrator] Strawberry. Strawberry. - A very recently discovered species. Entirely unique to this island. Oh, this one's lively. Beautiful sea patterns. (lips smacking) Oh, and it's tasty too. Welcome to the Island of Bugsnax. By the end you'll see We are whatever we eat - Awesome Find them hiding in the sun Tearing up a cabbage patch Come to snack to find us all (dramatic instrumental music) (roaring) (eerie instrumental music) - Hello, Blackreef, Colt, my predecessor has been pronounced guilty of treason. He is to be shot on sight, henceforth in perpetuity. Your assistance is appreciated and mandatory. The real party doesn't start until he's dead. - [Colt] She is not making this easy. (shot firing) - [Female] Ready to loop? Die already! (screaming) - [Colt] Blasted. (gunshots firing) Die! Damn. (upbeat rock music) I prepare, my leader - [Mia] Long ago, a young girl went with her mother to go pick berries for her father. It was hard at work. But the forest greeted them with a dark, cold silence. Yet determined to find the berries, the rascal broke free of mothers grasp and vanished into the trees. Mother's worried cries faded fast as the girl ran on, over vine, under branch and into the forest deep. - [Ethan] What is it with that creepy story? - [Mia] It's just a local tale. - [Ethan] You're really into that stuff. - [Mia] Quit being so paranoid. (gunshot firing) - [Ethan] No, no, friendly, friendly. Who are you? Who sent you? What's going on? - Shh. They're coming. - [Ethan] Who is? (gunshot firing) (gasping) - [Ethan] Chris? - Sorry, Ethan. (gunshots firing) - [Ethan] Why? (gentle tapping) (gunshot firing) (electronic buzzing) (thundering) (electronic buzzing) (glass shattering) (intense instrumental music) - What is Earth? - [Astronaut] Freedom. Our freedom. (electronic synth music) The old ones. Perished a thousand years ago. Their great cities turned to graves. In their place came new life. I must find a way stop it. Or it will get worse and worse. There's nothing I wouldn't do to save this world. No depth I won't explore. No secret I won't unlock. This mission is mine alone. If I falter, if I fail there won't be anyone left to stop what's coming. (gentle strings music) (calming electronic music) - [Narrator] PlayStation.
